acerca.title: About me
acerca.descripcion: I am a full stack web developer with experience in web application development. I specialize in web application development with technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, MySQL, Bootstrap, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, Git, and Heroku.
acerca.objetivo: My professional goal as a developer
acerca.objetivo-2: is to transmit the knowledge I have and encourage others to undertake this path.
